thread.title: Watch Kamala Harris sworn in as first Indian-American senator

title: Watch Kamala Harris sworn in as first Indian-American senator
text: Watch Kamala Harris sworn in as first Indian-American senator 1:38 Recent storms give Sierra snowpack a fighting chance at first measurement 0:38 MID board member testifies on salmon 0:22 Crash on Tully Road in Modesto 1:37 Scene of stabbing death on Ninth Street 1:50 Fire leads Merced deputies to marijuana grow 2:45 Modesto mom needs kidney transplant 0:29 Kids learn about almonds in Modesto 0:58 Turlock Singer and Foster Farms Give Donation 2:33 Blankets and more handed out to homeless in Modesto 2:17 Modesto Fire Department makes Mannequin Challenge video More Videos Searching For Missing Mom Brandy Chapman drove 22 hours from Oklahoma to Modesto to search for her mother, Sherry Suzanne Jennings, last seen by any family members in Modesto in 1994. Chapman hopes to find her mom, who suffers from mental illness compounded by drug abuse, and take her home to Oklahoma where she can be reunited with the family and receive free treatment.
